mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPR ( A_NO, A_R_NO, D_C_CODE, A_DOC_NO, A_TITLE, A_DATE, A_E_DATE1, A_E_DATE2, A_E_DATE3, A_PIC_NAME, A_TEAM_NY, A_DEC_NY, A_ALLDEC_NY, A_STATEMENT, A_SERVER_NAME, A_ORIGIN_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_APPROVAL.NEXTVAL, #{arNo}, #{dcCode}, #{aDocNo}, #{aTitle}, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL, NULL, #{aPicName}, 'N', 'N', 'N', 'N', #{changeName}, #{originName} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(A_NO) FROM APPR WHERE A_PIC_NAME = #{name} AND A_STATEMENT = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(A1.A_NO) FROM APPR A1 JOIN APPR_REGUL A2 ON A1.A_R_NO = A2.A_R_NO WHERE (A2.DECISION_CODE = #{loginjobTitleCode} OR A2.ALLDECISION_CODE = #{loginjobTitleCode}) AND A1.A_STATEMENT = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(A_NO) FROM APPR WHERE A_PIC_NAME = #{name} AND A_STATEMENT = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, R.* FROM( SELECT * FROM APPR WHERE A_PIC_NAME = #{loginName} AND A_STATEMENT = 'N' ORDER BY A_NO DESC ) R ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{page.startRow} AND #{page.endRow}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, R.* FROM( SELECT * FROM APPR A1 JOIN APPR_REGUL A2 ON A1.A_R_NO = A2.A_R_NO WHERE (A2.DECISION_CODE = #{loginjobTitleCode} OR A2.ALLDECISION_CODE = #{loginjobTitleCode}) AND A1.A_STATEMENT = 'N' ) R ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{page.startRow} AND #{page.endRow}
